methods_of_collection: directly from users during account signup or when requesting information
data_usage: to provide and maintain services, create and administer accounts, communicate with users, prevent fraud and abuse, investigate disputes and security issues, enforce terms of service
third_party_disclosure: affiliates and corporate partners, service providers and business partners, third parties in corporate transactions, regulatory authorities as required by law, third parties with user consent
retention_period: as long as reasonably necessary for purposes outlined in privacy policy
